name: NSApplication.ModalResponse
desc: A set of button return values for modal dialogs.

items.name: static let OK: NSApplication.ModalResponse
items.desc: The presentation or dismissal of the sheet has finished.

items.name: static let cancel: NSApplication.ModalResponse
items.desc: The presentation or dismissal of the sheet has been canceled.

items.name: static let `continue`: NSApplication.ModalResponse
items.desc: Modal session is continuing (returned by runModalSession(_:) only).

items.name: static let stop: NSApplication.ModalResponse
items.desc: Modal session was broken with stopModal().

items.name: static let abort: NSApplication.ModalResponse
items.desc: Modal session was broken with abortModal().

items.name: static let alertFirstButtonReturn: NSApplication.ModalResponse
items.desc: The user clicked the first (rightmost) button on the dialog or sheet.

items.name: static let alertSecondButtonReturn: NSApplication.ModalResponse
items.desc: The user clicked the second button from the right edge of the dialog or sheet.

items.name: static let alertThirdButtonReturn: NSApplication.ModalResponse
items.desc: The user clicked the third button from the right edge of the dialog or sheet.
